review: The device(Fire TV Stick) tries hard to do it's job, and succeeds most of the time. It is a good streaming media player. My issue is with technical support, they do not seem to know much about the product. It's like it's not an Amazon product at all. The answers others, and I have received about trivial questions are very stupid, yes that is the best answer. For example, in one case Tech Support told the customer to contact an entirely different company for an issue having only to do with the Amazon Fire TV product. I was personally given an answer which was instantly proven wrong.

review: This streaming device is amazing! I love Amazon Instant Video and this makes it super easy to watch my shows. The only issue that I have come across so far is purchased YouTube videos. It will play regular YouTube videos no problem but if you purchase a video (i.e. The Interview), it will not play.Great job Amazon!
